author: cnbc.com
title: TDb Split Corp. Regular Monthly Dividend Declaration Class A & Preferred Share
text:
TDb Split Corp. ("TDb Split") declares its regular monthly distribution of $0.05000 for each Class A share ($0.60 annually) and $0.04375 for each Preferred share ($0.525 annually).
Since inception, Class A shareholders have received a total of $5.25 per share and Preferred shareholders have received a total of $5.59 per share inclusive of this distribution, for a combined total of $10.84.
TDb Split invests in common shares of Toronto-Dominion Bank, a leading Canadian Financial institution.
Distribution Details Class A Share (XTD) $0.05000 Preferred Share (XTD.PR.A) $0.04375
Local: 416-304-4443
